inclusion.criterion: Refractory, recurrent or relapsing C. difficile infection (CDI) defined as EITHER: At least three episodes of mild-to-moderate CDI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to accept risk of unrelated donor stool
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to consent for self, or parental assent/child assent as age appropriate
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient is a 60-year-old woman with recent history of aspiration pneumonia and C. difficile toxin positive stool samples.
